attributes.action: Sentence's given to Baby P's Murderers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: please sign this petition, so that the disgusting and abhorrent sentences passed against the trio of vermin that collectivley murdered this young boy, are increased to life sentences(with a recommendation of 22years before parole.For which they must surely. deserve

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
